ComicInfo.Penciller: Earl Norem,Mark Pennington,Rey Garcia,Ernie Chan,Fred Harper,Mark Pennington,Rey Garcia,Ernie Chan,Fred Harper
ComicInfo.Title: Day of Manhood; Treasure; A Horror of a Different Color; the Phoenix in the Shadow
ComicInfo.Summary:
Day of Manhood: To prove himself a man, a teenage Conan must endure a test of strength and defeat a rampaging bull.
Treasure: Conan takes sail to the sea, battling demons and others to find hidden treasure.
A Horror of a Different Color: An early morning hunt becomes life-threatening when the tables are turned and Conan becomes the prey.
the Phoenix in the Shadow: King Conan and his men travel to the palace of Aquilonia and must pit themselves against the sorcery of Thoth-Amon.
ComicInfo.Letterer: Janice Chiang,Ellie de Ville,Diana Albers,Madonna Limcaco,Janice Chiang,Ellie de Ville,Diana Albers,Madonna Limcaco
